alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Greene (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 1:24PM CDT until May 07 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Greene County in west central Iowa... Central Carroll County in west central Iowa... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 124 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Halbur, or 9 miles southwest of Carroll, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Templeton around 130 PM CDT. Carroll and Dedham around 140 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Willey, Swan Lake State Park, Lidderdale, Arthur N Neu Airport, Glidden, Ralston and Scranton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
